import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Cart = () => { const cart=useSelector((state=>state.cart )) dis const handelRemoteFromCart =(cartItem) =>{ } return (

Shopping Cart

{cart.cartItems.length===0 ?

Your cart is currently empty

Start Shopping
:
Product

Price

Quantity

Total

{cart.cartItems?.map((cartItem)=>{ return (

{cartItem.name}

{cartItem.desc}

${cartItem.price}
{cartItem .cartQuantity}
${cartItem.price* cartItem.cartQuantity}
) })}
Clear Cart
Subtotal ${cart.CartTotalAmount}

Taxes and shipping caculated at checout

Continue Shopping
}
); } export default Cart;
